data.name: Google Spotlight Stories: Piggy
data.detailed_description:
A jogging pig meets a delicious cake. Will he give in to temptation? Not while you’re watching! Google Spotlight Stories presents Piggy VR, a new level of interaction between character and audience.

Directed by Jan Pinkava & Mark Oftedal
Produced with Evil Eye Pictures
data.about_the_game:
A jogging pig meets a delicious cake. Will he give in to temptation? Not while you’re watching! Google Spotlight Stories presents Piggy VR, a new level of interaction between character and audience.

Directed by Jan Pinkava & Mark Oftedal
Produced with Evil Eye Pictures
data.short_description: A jogging pig meets a delicious cake. Will he give in to temptation? Not while you’re watching! Google Spotlight Stories presents Piggy VR, a new level of interaction between character and audience. Directed by Jan Pinkava & Mark Oftedal. Produced with Evil Eye Pictures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Процессор: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Место на диске: 512 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Any
  • Дополнительно: Make sure internal GPU is not used on laptops. Some drivers automatically use internal GPU for OpenGL applications.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Процессор: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Место на диске: 512 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Any
  • Дополнительно: Make sure internal GPU is not used on laptops. Some drivers automatically use internal GPU for OpenGL applications.
